about_the_game:
"Double Play" is a visual novel for adults only. A young slacker named David moves into his late grandmother's house, where he meets the charming female neighbors, but one innocent prank turns his life upside down.

When young David moves into his late grandmother's old house, there's no way he expected his new life to turn into a convoluted comedy of misunderstandings. It all starts with an innocent joke: sitting in a wheelchair, David attracts the attention of his neighbor named Amelia, who mistakenly believes that he is paralyzed. Willingly, she begins to help him without knowing the truth.

In this unusual story full of unique characters, David finds himself at the center of a romantic whirlwind. Michelle, the attractive girl opposite, stirs his imagination, and Clara, Amelia's aunt, with her confidence in her own divinity, adds spice to the situation. And as if that weren't enough, the crazy grandfather next door with his eccentric antics makes life even more unpredictable.

True feelings begin to blossom, but one unexpected discovery could jeopardize everything. How can David save his relationship without losing his trust? And what lessons of true love and honesty will he have to learn from this confusion?

Join us in Double Play, a visual novel where every move can have unpredictable consequences. Humor, drama and sincere feelings await you in a world where truth comes before everything else.


Game Features:

An exciting plot with unexpected twists and turns: "Double Play" offers a gripping story with many comic and dramatic moments that keeps players in suspense until the very end.

Charismatic and ambiguous characters: Each character is unique and memorable, adding depth to the story.

Atmospheric soundtrack: The soundtrack and music set the mood, immersing you in the atmosphere of the story.

Deep and emotionally rich dialog: Double Play's dialog is carefully crafted to convey character personalities and plot points, making interactions between characters realistic and memorable.

Elements of humor and serious themes: The game mixes light humor with serious themes such as self-discovery, honesty, and the complexities of interpersonal relationships, making the story accessible and deep for a wide audience.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains sexual liaisons, sexual harassment, and non-consensual sexual activity. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

name: Double Play

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
